features: Tackles 99% of most common stains and odours
All in One laundry detergent that removes stains, odours, has a fresh scent & works in Coldwater
With a more concentrated formula, you get more cleaning agents and less water in every drop. *vs. previous formula
Works in laundry loads for both HE and non-HE washing machines
body.description: Tide Simply All-In-One liquid laundry detergent that tackles 99% of the most common stains and odours. This All-in-one detergent tackles stains, odours, has a fresh scent & works in coldwater. It is now more concentrated to provide more stain removal and freshness and less water*. From Canada's#1 detergent,** to cover your many laundry needs.Also try our powerful Tide PODS laundry pacs. Measure your loads with cap. For medium loads, fill to bar 1. For large loads, fill to bar 3. For HE full loads, fill to bar 5. Add clothes, pour into dispenser, start washer. * vs. previous formula ** based on sales

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my parents. Purchasing this size and having it delivered to the front door is top tier. It provides great value for the price. We love the detergent scent because it’s not overbearing. The product does a great job with laundering clothes. Everything is clean and fresh. Also, we lay the bottle on it’s side, so we don’t have to lift it to pour out content. Super helpful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars There may not be a lot of suds your clothes will still be clean
reviews.reviewText: The price is almost half the cost of other detergents in same size container. This product your clothes smell great and are clean. No irritation to skin which mine is sensitive

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price for amount.
reviews.reviewText: Smells really awesome, does the job but like any other needs a little help (other agents) on tougher stains, brights/whites but Tide w/oxi imo seems to cleans even better than any other Especially if you have sons in sports etc they need the extra dirt and scented help..lol, I bought the oxi one as well and it's my usual buy of oxi added versions or tide pods original oxi (works wonders)At 114 loads priced as the 74/76 load bottle ounces, “bonus”. so I've tried this one, and I like it! Smells like I added My scented fabric softener and I didn't! Nice! This is coming from a person who use to purchase bargain detergent or other name brands refused to give my arm leg for a detergent..lol, but these prices are workable more pocket friendly and clothes come out clean and fresh w/o having to over use detergent to get clothes clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this product. It cleans our clothes well and has an amazing smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value e subscribe and save
reviews.reviewText: Shipping issI recently purchased the Tide Simply Liquid Laundry Detergent in the Refreshing Breeze scent, and overall, I'm quite satisfied with its performance. Let me share my thoughts and experiences in this review.First and foremost, when it comes to cleaning power, this detergent delivers excellent results. It effectively removes stains and leaves my clothes looking and smelling fresh. The Refreshing Breeze scent is pleasant and not overpowering, which is a definite plus for me. I appreciate that it doesn't leave any residue on my garments, ensuring they remain soft and comfortable to wear.The quantity provided in this bottle is impressive, offering up to 114 loads of laundry. It's cost-effective and has lasted me for a considerable amount of time, saving me from frequent trips to the store to restock. This is especially convenient for busy individuals or families with a large amount of laundry to tackle.However, I did encounter a minor issue with the shipping of this product when ordering from Amazon. The packaging wasn't entirely secure, resulting in some leakage during transit. It was disappointing to receive a slightly messy package, and I hope the manufacturer addresses this issue to ensure a hassle-free experience for customers.Despite the shipping mishap, the quality of the Tide Simply Liquid Laundry Detergent itself remains unaffected. It's a reliable and efficient product that I would recommend to anyone in need of a dependable laundry detergent. Just be cautious when ordering online to avoid any potential leakage mishaps.In conclusion, Tide Simply Liquid Laundry Detergent in the Refreshing Breeze scent has proven to be a highly effective and long-lasting detergent. Its cleaning power is impressive, leaving clothes fresh and stain-free. While I did experience some shipping issues, the quality of the product itself outweighs this minor inconvenience. Give it a try, and you won't be disappointed with the results it provides.

reviews.reviewText: I like this detergent. It works as well as the more expensive brands and at a much better price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's Tide need I say anything else
reviews.reviewText: As always Tide is a great product to get all my laundry needs met. The value is great and product gets all my laundry clean with one washing. The best part of being an Amazon purchase , its that it comes to my front door.
